com.ic.invisiblecollector

Class CustomerApiFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
      • com.ic.invisiblecollector.CustomerApiFacade

  • public class CustomerApiFacade
extends com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
    Immutable and thread safe class for making operations on the /customers API endpoint.

    For object construction see IcApiFacade

    Author:
    ros

    • Method Detail

      • registerNewCustomer

        public Customer registerNewCustomer(Customer customerInfo)
                             throws IcException,
                                    IcConflictingException
        Register a new customer in the database.

        See registerNewCustomer(Map) for more details.

        Parameters:
        customerInfo - the object containing the customer information. null values will be discarded
        Throws:
        IcException
        IcConflictingException

      • registerNewCustomer

        public Customer registerNewCustomer(java.util.Map<CustomerField,java.lang.Object> customerInfo)
                             throws IcException,
                                    IcConflictingException
        Register a new customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerInfo - a map containing the fields of the customer to be created. See CustomerField for a description of the attributes and their possible values. null values are not discarded. See CustomerField.assertCorrectlyInitialized(Map) for a list of the mandatory attributes.
        Returns:
        an up to date Customer containing the customer's information
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        IcConflictingException - in case the vatNumber or externalId already exists for another customer in the database. In that case this object contains the id of the conflicting customer.
        See Also:
        registerNewCustomer(Customer)

      • requestCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestCustomerAttributes(IRoutable idContainer)
                                                                           throws IcException
        Get the customer attributes string map.

        See requestCustomerAttributes(String) for more details.

        Parameters:
        idContainer - An object (such as a Customer object) that contains the id or externalId of the customer
        Throws:
        IcException

      • requestCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestCustomerAttributes(java.lang.String customerId)
                                                                           throws IcException
        Get the customer attributes string map.

        Use setCustomerAttributes(IRoutable, Map) or setCustomerAttributes(String, Map) to set the attributes returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the customer (can be the id or externalId).
        Returns:
        a map containing up-to-date string:string attribute pairs which correspond to the customer.
        Throws:
        IcException - in case of any error
        See Also:
        requestCustomerAttributes(IRoutable)

        Get the customer's debts.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id or external id of the customer
        Returns:

      • setCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> setCustomerAttributes(IRoutable idContainer,
                                                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
                                                                       throws IcException
        Set the customer's string map attributes.

        See setCustomerAttributes(String, Map) for more details.

        Parameters:
        idContainer - an object containing the id or externalId of the customer (can be a Customer object).
        Throws:
        IcException

      • setCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> setCustomerAttributes(java.lang.String customerId,
                                                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
                                                                       throws IcException
        Set the customer's string map attributes.

        Use requestCustomerAttributes(String) or requestCustomerAttributes(IRoutable) to get the attributes that are set.

        Parameters:
        customerId - the id or externalId of the customer.
        attributes - the map with the attributes to set. Duplicate values in the database are updated, while pre-existing values in the database are unaffected.
        Returns:
        a map containing up-to-date string:string attribute pairs which correspond to the customer.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general error
        See Also:
        setCustomerAttributes(IRoutable, Map)

      • updateCustomerInfo

        public Customer updateCustomerInfo(Customer customerInfo)
                            throws IcException
        Update the customer's info in the database.

        See updateCustomerInfo(Map, String) for more details.

        Parameters:
        customerInfo - the customer info. Must contain as well an id or externalId that indicates the customer to update. null values will be discarded
        Throws:
        IcException

      • updateCustomerInfo

        public Customer updateCustomerInfo(java.util.Map<CustomerField,java.lang.Object> customerInfo,
                                   java.lang.String customerId)
                            throws IcException
        Update the customer's info in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerInfo - the new customer info. null values will not be discarded. See CustomerField for a list and description of the fields of a customer. See CustomerField.assertCorrectlyInitialized(Map) for a list of the mandatory attributes.
        customerId - the id or externalId of the customer.
        Returns:
        the up-to-date customer info.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        See Also:
        updateCustomerInfo(Customer)
